languages.text: [Напасть] "Когда я вырву твой лживый раздвоенный язык, ты станешь понятливее".
[Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."
languages.original_text: [Напасть] "Когда я вырву твой лживый раздвоенный язык, ты станешь понятливее".

traits.locale_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

[Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

languages.text: [攻击]“不如我干脆把你那条撒谎的分叉舌头扯下来吧。”
languages.original_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

traits.locale_text: [攻击]“不如我干脆把你那条撒谎的分叉舌头扯下来吧。”

languages.text: [Atacar] «Será más fácil entenderte cuando te arranque esa embustera lengua bífida».
languages.original_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

traits.locale_text: [Atacar] «Será más fácil entenderte cuando te arranque esa embustera lengua bífida».

languages.text: ［攻撃する］「その薄汚い舌をこの場で引きちぎれば私の気持ちもわかるだろう」
languages.original_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

traits.locale_text: ［攻撃する］「その薄汚い舌をこの場で引きちぎれば私の気持ちもわかるだろう」

languages.text: [Angreifen] "Ihr versteht es gewiss schneller, wenn ich Euch Eure verlogene, gespaltene Zunge herausreiße."
languages.original_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

traits.locale_text: [Angreifen] "Ihr versteht es gewiss schneller, wenn ich Euch Eure verlogene, gespaltene Zunge herausreiße."

languages.text: [Attaquer] « Vous comprendrez plus vite si j'arrache votre langue fourchue de menteur. »
languages.original_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

traits.locale_text: [Attaquer] « Vous comprendrez plus vite si j'arrache votre langue fourchue de menteur. »

languages.text: [Saldır] "Yalancı mahluk, o yılan dilini sökeyim de akıllan."
languages.original_text: [Attack] "You'll be quicker to understand when I rip out your lying forked tongue."

traits.locale_text: [Saldır] "Yalancı mahluk, o yılan dilini sökünce akıllanırsın şimdi."
